introduction.text: This Cookie Policy explains how Valment Partners Inc. ("we", "our", or "us") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website www.valment.com (the "Website").
introduction.whatAreCookies: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your visit, which can make your next visit easier and the website more useful to you.

subsections.subtitle: Essential Cookies
subsections.content: These cookies are necessary for the Website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.
examples: Session cookies that keep you logged in as you navigate between pages
Security cookies that help identify and prevent security risks
Load balancing cookies that ensure the Website remains stable and available

subsections.subtitle: Analytics Cookies
subsections.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our Website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. We use this information to improve our Website and services.
examples: Google Analytics cookies that track visitor behavior and demographics
Cookies that measure page performance and loading times
Cookies that help us understand which content is most popular

subsections.subtitle: Functional Cookies
subsections.content: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and choices.
examples: Cookies that remember your language preference
Cookies that save your form inputs for convenience
Cookies that remember your display preferences

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.intro: We use the following third-party services that may set cookies on your device:
sections.note: These third-party services have their own privacy policies and cookie policies. We recommend reviewing their policies to understand how they use cookies and how to manage your preferences.

subsections.subtitle: Browser Settings
subsections.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can typically:
items: View what cookies are stored on your device
Block all cookies or specific cookies
subsections.note: Please note that blocking all cookies may affect the functionality of our Website and other websites you visit.

sections.title: Cookie Retention
sections.content: Different cookies have different retention periods:

types.duration: Deleted when you close your browser
Remain on your device for a set period (typically 1-24 months) or until you delete them

sections.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
